title: Total amount of approved funding for developing countries to promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 468kB)
indicator_name: Total amount of funding for developing countries to promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies
target: Promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies to developing countries on favourable terms, including on concessional and preferential terms, as mutually agreed
page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
